A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst Star Wars movie ever created\, including the prequels. Uninteresting characters\, poor acting\, awkward humor\, an incoherent plot\, and I could go on and on. Save your money and your time. Go watch Rogue One again\, whose creators were infinitely more inspired than those who came up with this Last Jedi steaming pile. It was so bad\, it made the Force Awakens look decent by comparison.
